text:
Police and flying squad have seized Rs.2.19 lakh from banana traders from Kerala at Kavalkinaru in the district.

When the police and members of a flying squad, led by Block Development Officer Gopalakrishnan were conducting vehicle check at Kaavalkinaru around 3 a.m. on Wednesday, they intercepted a lorry, proceeding from Thiruvananthapuram to Kalakkad to take banana. On searching the lorry, the police recovered Rs.2.19 lakh from the vehicle.

Though the traders going to the weekly banana market told the officials that they were taking the cash to settle their dues owed to the growers, they could not provide documents to prove their claim.
title: Rs.2.19 lakh seized
